name: MIT App Inventor Project
summary: Learn about .AIA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: App Inventor allows you to drag and drop elements, such as buttons, images, text boxes, and sliders, to create a mobile application and program its functionality. When you save an App Inventor project, it is typically saved to your online account. However, you can also download App Inventor projects as AIA files. To download a project as an AIA file, select Projects and choose Export selected project (.aia) to my computer.
NOTE: You can also use Kodular Creator, an App Inventor variant, to open AIA files.

instructions: You can open AIA files in MIT App Inventor (Web). To do so, select Projects â†’ Import project from my computer.... Then, when the Import Project... window appears, browse to and open your AIA file.
